content:
hi all, thanks for an excellent meeting today!
great slides Jonathan and Charlotte! please upload them to our Google Drive repo.

Things I want of all of us:

  1. Five questions that we want to work, on from each subgroup, to add to 20 questions.
    these questions have to be actionable, not too generic like "solve climate change".

  2. Basic references from each group, already read, please.

  3. github and overleaf repos (where applicable) checked.

EDIT: I hope all the slides from the 4 previous meetings will be put in the respective folders in the Google Drive MRC-Dialectica: Dial-Games, Dial-Poly, Dial-Lenses, Dial-Calc (for calculations instead of implementation), together with the basic references, please. There should be 3 recordings of meetings, 4 chats and several sets of slides.
